dia.str: Sabrina told me you have a cure for...

Sabrina again? Young man, you should be more careful. I know what you need. Bring me four beetle glands and you will be fine in no time. Now go; I don't want to hear about Sabrina's activities. I knew I shouldn't have let her have so much freedom. Let that be a lesson for you. Sometimes children need your full attention.
Thank you, Roberta. I will be back with the glands.
